target: There is not really enough information about what he wrote about, maybe he was not a successful writer?
context: <user> I love frank ocean, can you tell me more about him?  <system> Frank Ocean is an American independent singer, songwriter, producer and photographer. I say he is jack of all trades.    <user> i did not know he did photography. What are some his popular songs?  <system> His first charting single is called Novacane. I don't know he is a photographer either. He is amazing right?  <user> Is really is. Very talented. What else might I not know about him, or even find interesting?   <system> He was a ghostwriter when he started his career and in 2010 he became a member of a hip hop group called Odd Future. <user>  <user> that is really cool. Do you know anything he ghostwrote, or for, if not, any other fact will do. <system>
